channel.title: fabric on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in fabric on Mark Needham

item.title: Neo4j: Cross database querying with Neo4j Fabric
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I wrote a QuickGraph blog post about the Australian Open, in which I showed how to use Neo4j 4.0’s multi database feature. In that post we focused on queries that could be run on one database, but the 4.0 release also contains another feature for doing cross database querying - Neo4j Fabric - and we’re going to learn how to use that in this post.

item.title: Fabric: Tailing log files on multiple machines
item.description: fab -H host1,host2,host3 -- tail -f /var/www/awesome/current/log/production.log fab -P --linewise -H host1,host2,host3 -- tail -f /var/www/awesome/current/log/production.log
